description:
Zorc’s incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound!  With a second chance at revenge, the bandit king has broken up the Pharaoh’s team so that he can divide and conquer them one at a time!  With his horde of monsters hunting our heroes, will any of them survive to see another day?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Countdown to the Evil God`s Resurrection
邪神復活へのカウントダウン
